summary: Global cities are important places that have a big impact on the world's economy, finance, and culture. They are like powerful hubs that connect different cities and countries. These cities are highly developed with big populations, famous companies, and strong financial systems. They have excellent transport links and are home to top educational institutions. Global cities, such as New York, London, Paris, and Tokyo, are known for their influence and contributions to global ideas and culture.
title: Global city
